website_summaries.verdict: This day bed comes with a trundle and has the benefit of storage drawers.
pros: A classy way to safe space and add extra sleeping capacity to your home
cons: The drawers can be tricky to assemble properly

customer_reviews.title: If you're hesitating- don't!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed!!! I bought it for our second guest bedroom to allow multiple guests without the maximum usage of space. I put it together by myself (I'm a 31 yo female) and didn't run into any issues. It was all packaged VERY well, no damage on anything. There's also no smell mentioned by other people, mine didn't smell bad or stink up the house. The material is very solid and well made. I've had nothing but compliments so far!! I bought an 8" memory foam mattress for the top and plan to buy a 6" memory foam mattress for the trundle, so there's ample room for bedding. Very impressed with this bed and very very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Awful service, quality, and product different from what was ordered
customer_reviews.text: Total failure. the tundler does not even fit under the bed besides been different from what we ordered. The drawers do not fit and the back piece didn't come, instead 3 pieces that would fit the sides of the bed. Besides the drawers itself are brown with that white from where you can still see the brow of the drawer. It is ridiculous. I need the underbed and the drawer space and cannot do anything with what I have. It is too disappointing. Check what was ordered and what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Flavia S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great bed at an amazing price compared to similar offerings at furniture/bedroom stores.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking bed, and extremely practical; however, it is pretty high, and there are no steps, thus we have to leave the trundle out a little to create a step for my four-year-old daughter. Also, the white color is a little dull and slightly tinted yellow. It may not match other bright whites very well. Lastly, the wheels on the trundle do not work well on carpet. I'm still looking for another caster made for plush carpet. Overall, I'm satisfied and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Bed for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I searched online for a comparable bed but couldn't find one at this price range. My family moved into a new home the bed my daughter had was just too big for her new room, so we settled for a Captain's Trundle Bed. This thing took a few hours to put together - but with some patience and a helpful wife, it got completed - and all parts were there, the pieces were good quality, and paint was great and it looks sooooo good. My daughter loves it. She has made new friends and has already had a sleepover and it worked great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality as before...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Coaster purchase. My 7 year old has the exact same bed - we bought it in 2013. We recently purchased this bed for my son. 5 years later and the quality difference is huge. The trundle on the new bed is impossible to pull out without two people. The older version glides out and has swivel wheels. The newer version was made with a weaker thinner material and the bed wobbles. We have already had the reinforce the bed frame as it cracked the first week. It’s a shame the quality has declined so much as we love our original bed. The bed is now made in China and arrived weeks later in 5 boxes.
customer_reviews.author: sarah balint

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for,my daughter a year ago. It is beautiful. Easy assembly with 2 ppl. Bed has not shown a flaws for the past year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Reds bug

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good purchase. It by far met my expectations, it was exactly what I wanted as far as being "not a flimsy piece of furniture". It's a kids bed and I need to withstand kids. It is a very heavy duty material, the slats that hold the mattress up are thick. Came packaged really well so it would not be damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bed, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The bed was just what I was looking for! It works great for my girls. It came in good condition and was easy to put together, as long as you have a little help with the larger pieces. I feel like the upper bed could be a little more stable. My girls wanted to jump on it and later I noticed a small hairline crack in one piece, but I don't think it will be a problem. I really like how easy the trundle pulls out and the drawers are great. All but one of the drawers has a smooth pull, but I think in time that one will smooth out too. Overall I'm quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C M Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: White is not as bright as thought,  more of an off white.
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself seems in a good quality.... White was more of an off white. Received product and side panel was split about 5 inches. Went through hoops with Amazon/Coaster to get replaced and waited about 3 weeks for product initially then now again for replacement. Hopefully I receive the replacement product without any cracks... Will update once received and able to complete assembly.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: WARNING -DO NOT BUY !!!
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions included and almost impossible to put it together. We are still trying to put it and fix it but it was a TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY..... Communication from seller is almost zero they reply after a couple of days. BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The delivery service was well organized, courteous and easy to set up. It arrives in three boxes, large and wrapped twice with cardboard. Take time to assemble. Once done, I could see why ppl say it won’t last through a move. It’s sturdy material. But after a few bang arounds it probably will fall apart. Overall nice bed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Quality control problems
customer_reviews.text: See pictures. Quality control issue. Ours came with a crack in the bottom left headboard. Its painfully obvious that this was done on final assembly when the stopper was attached probably without a pilot hole, which is why it cracked. Amazon should hold its vendors to a higher standard, how this passed inspection is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: Moreno

customer_reviews.title: the quality of the bed is fine and it will last for years
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the quality of the bed is fine and it will last for years. The way the trundle portion with drawers is assembled was a design issue that could be improved. Too much hand screwing on the rails and drawer runners that would not allow a cordless drill to make things faster. I would have liked more cam and metal pin locks, pre-drilled holes or starters, and generally more clearance near the corners or floor area to use the drill. Just design tweets are needed, but as is the job was completed and we like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and exactly what we need for our daughter small ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and exactly what we need for our daughter small room. Cleans easily. Little hard to put together so many pieces. Drawers are little small but what I expected. Will not replace a dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great look, terrible delivery system!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what everyone else is talking about on here, this bed arrived and yes it came on 2 huge pallets off a semi pulled up in front of my home with a semi!!! I walked out and thank god the delivery guy was so nice!! His orders were to drop the pallets at the curb in front of my home! I asked him if he would be willing to put it at least in my garage and he obliged. Other then that the bed is of great quality, easy construction, no lacquer smell and work great.
customer_reviews.author: KoolKinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed with simple directions for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bed with simple directions for assembly. Went together seamlessly. Seems to be well made and looks great! There were some delivery delays, but when I contacted the seller with my concerns, the delivery issue was straightened out IMMEDIATELY. I really appreciated the excellent customer service. This bed cost much less than similar beds online and at my local furniture store. This customer is HAPPY😀!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Trundle isn't hidden
customer_reviews.text: The shipment was very quick of this product and the assembly was easily managed with two people. However, we purchased this bed under the assumption that the trundle would be completely hidden behind the faux drawers. Why else have faux drawers? In reality, there was a 4" gap between the top of the drawers and the bed frame, leaving the trundle bed completely visible even when closed. The picture here was deceiving, and we ultimately decided to return the bed. The return process though was very smooth and the service provided was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: meghan s

customer_reviews.title: Nice day bed with trundle.
customer_reviews.text: I just put this daybed together. It came in 3 boxes which was overwhelming at first, but then it was great once laid out. It was very easy to put together, but you really need two people. Everything is wood which is nice. The drawers are a great extra feature, but don't open easily. You actually need to put your thumb in the handle, and your fingers on the BOTTOM of the drawer to pull. This pulls down and it comes out. If you try to open regularly, you are pulling up and it is as if the drawers are locked. Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Eftyking

customer_reviews.title: The bed is very nice. Somewhat easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very nice. Somewhat easy to put together. 8 inch mattress on the trundle is snug, but it fits. In the future I'd recommend buying a six inch for the trundle. 8in was very tight.
customer_reviews.author: AM45

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and materials made for a good assembly of this bed. Made in Vietnam from some kind of solid wood, not fiber board or laminate. Assembled product is very sturdy. Pictured unit gives the impression that the trundle fits evenly with the lower bed rail of the top bed, it does not. There is a large gap that shows the mattress and bedding; you will need a bed spread to cover this opening if you don't want to see the trundle bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many beds online that looked exactly thee same for hundreds more. This bed is very solid, looks great and works well. I highly recommend it. One small thing. The white is an off white. Not super white but looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dlcd

customer_reviews.title: Great material but damaged
customer_reviews.text: The material felt of very good quality but some of the main pieces were damaged so I has to return
customer_reviews.author: Ccarreon

customer_reviews.title: The color was perfect. Some of the screws and holes were not ...
customer_reviews.text: The color was perfect. Some of the screws and holes were not right, as some stripped and some holes were too big for the screws. We made it work luckily. Also didn't realize we had to make holes as well to insert the screws into certain areas.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Gard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed!!! Looks just like in the picture. Very sturdy and drawers open and close very good. Was kind of worried about the drawers being sturdy. Twin 4 year old girls sleep on this bed and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Heavy Duty Bed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as our daughters first bed. Very solid and strong and the trundle is much higher than a regular trundle which makes it more of a normal bed and can easily be used for guest.
customer_reviews.author: Zera Diamond

customer_reviews.title: You Will Not be Disappointed with this Bed!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's love their new bed. It's cute and simply designed to put together. We were pleasantly surprised with the wood drawers already being put together. Compared to some other bedroom furniture I just bought, this was a piece of cake to put together! It's wood too, not that awful heavy pressed stuff. The drawers have good old wood slides and work great! I would definitely recommend this item. We are very satisfied with the product and the price is unbelievably low compared to other places for the same bed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne J.

customer_reviews.title: So much storage! Don't add an extra mattress and add under the bed storage tubs!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bed. It's well made, and love all the extra storage. We ended up not putting an extra mattress on the trundle and put under the bed tubs for even more storage, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chesney S.

customer_reviews.title: It's Tall
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but bed is very very tall. Bought for toddlers and only using trundle part due to the extreme height of bed.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Nice worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: The shipping took a long time. Longer then the estimated time. Confusion on what day they were suppose to come and a signature was needed. But when the bed was put together my daughter loved it. Made an adjustment to the trendal bed by putting an extra screw to stabilize it. The trendal comes all the way out nothing to stop it from rolling. Fits nicely in a small bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Hard to deal with
customer_reviews.text: The bed is nice but came in with damage and a broken drawer. Months later I am still trying to get the drawer replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Borgeson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy and good looking bed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture but it was missing two small parts in the drawers or not billed correctly we had to reassemble them correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful/Practical Bed
customer_reviews.text: We recently finished our basement and add two rooms for our teenaged daughters. We had two bedroom sets in storage to place in their new rooms once they were complete. My oldest daughter's set did not fit. We chose this bed because it was beautiful and practical. The storage drawers are an amazing use of space and hold her t-shirts, shorts and cold weather gear.The trundle is great for her little sister who is "not ready" to sleep in her own room. My daughter loves this bed and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: edgewoodkathy

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The bed is made out of pine which is nice however, there were not pre drilled hole for several pieces and the drawers do not glide in easily or straight without manipulating them. For the price of this bed, I would have expected better. I had to return it once already which was a total pain and refused to do it again so I will just deal with the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: MMeador

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two beds. When it arrived, the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two beds. When it arrived, the headboard of both beds were broken on the the same spot. I had to nail the broken pieces in order to screw back a part of the bed. I have read other reviews with similar problems. The other reviewers stated that it was a headache getting the problems resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin PT

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this bed for my six year old daughter. She is really girly and the design of the bed makes her smile. I love the drawer space and my husband loved that it was simple enough for him to assemble without help from anyone. All around a great purchase. Just one note, the bed is high. My daughter uses a small footstool to help her up (but that just adds to her fun)!
customer_reviews.author: APL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great, real wood. It is heavy, so a second set of hands is a must.
customer_reviews.author: NRainey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy trundle bed
customer_reviews.text: The first bed was damaged and it was promptly replaced. The return process was very easy. The bed is sturdy, make sure you buy mattresses thin enough to fit. I added Tempurpedic mattress covers which still fit and make the bed very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very sturdy. This will be a piece we have for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Janice Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: For my teen son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed in February 2014. I wanted to wait a couple months before writing a review. First off, my son absolutely loves this bed. It has lots of storage space, and is perfect for a teenage boy.This bed was easy to assemble. It only took me and my boyfriend about 1 1/2 hours to set it up. The trundle part of the bed is not attached to the rest of the bed, so that it can be removed completely. It is very good quality, and looks great. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, it's a high bed for kids and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, it's a high bed for kids and I had to buy a 7" mattress to fit in the trumble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed for the price. I love the additional storage; definitely needed for a smaller bedroom. I read the other reviews about needing a smaller mattress for the trundle so I purchased an 8 inch and it works great! My husband put it together with a small about of help from my 12 year old daughter. I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: 3texmom

customer_reviews.title: Broken bed.
customer_reviews.text: Bed broke less than a year of having it. Have gotten no response in regards to a replacement piece. Was also sent a different bed than the one pictured.
customer_reviews.author: kristen reagan

customer_reviews.title: Hit with this 2 Yr old
customer_reviews.text: Great Granddaughter absolutely loved her new big girl bed and supervised it being put together by her Dad. She slept in it that night. A very Happy & Excited nearly 2 Yr old! The dad who is not one to want to put together had no difficulty in getting assembled. Great birthday gift for our girl.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: We are not "handy" people but we were able to ...
customer_reviews.text: We are not "handy" people but we were able to put this bed together with only one hang-up. Turned bed around and didn't think about the trundle sliding under and blocks needed to stop it. Later we noticed the blocks in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed!
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived in 3 boxes. I must say the boxes are VERY heavy and need 2 or more people to carry them. Assembling took about 2 hours and the bed looks beautiful! Very sturdy and well made. I bought an 8-inch mattress to put on top and a 6-inch for the trundle and they were perfect. I still have some space for a comforter on trundle bed. The bed is very high and I love it! Tge drawers are great! I woul recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Marques

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 -3 people to put together, read directions, put screws and hardware in baggie per stage and all is well. Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gubnitsky

customer_reviews.title: very nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: very nice piece of furniture! I'm only giving 4 stars because the color is a bit more "red" than expected or pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Burgoyne

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but there were some parts that came ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but there were some parts that came damaged due to manufacturer. Item just as described and my kids love it. I found wonderful mattresses on line to fit into the bed.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful daybed and the storage is an added bonus. Both mattresses we had fit perfect. You can't have a twin mattress with a topper, but a regular one fits great. My daughter loves it. It's sturdy and will last for years. It wasn't hard to together either. My only complaint is that the shipping company didn't contact me to deliver it and just left it in my drive way, but that's not the bed company or Amazon's fault. Highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Bed is huge.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is HUGE! We have had it up for a year, as a guest bed. & I am disappointed in the quality. It's showing cracks, & it's very tall. The room is small & this bed is an eyesore, I am taking it down. Selling it.
customer_reviews.author: LPresto

customer_reviews.title: We love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My two girls love their new bed! It is a very solid piece, made of real wood, and the drawers and the lower bed pull out smoothly. Assembly is somewhat tricksy, definitely have at least two helpers. The trundle with the extra drawers make this a real space saver.
customer_reviews.author: OrionStarion

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed. Uses actual wood. Sturdy. Trundle rolls out smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.  Nice to have an extra bed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Damage in shipping. Amazon A to Z fixed problem. Great for over-nite grand children.
customer_reviews.author: Deane Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Trundle Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so nice and sturdy, bought it for the grandkids when they come to stay, my baby granddaughter looks so cute in it, and it has the trundle that I pull out in cause she rolls during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bed for the price. Live the extra storage
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected. My only complaint is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected. My only complaint is the delivery. I thought the idea of it being "prime" was that it was 2 day shipping. It took almost 2 weeks to get here. Otherwise, it was way easier to put together than IKEA furniture. It ended up being way higher off the ground than I anticipated. My 3 year old needs a step stool to climb up in her own. But that was my fault since I didn't check the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: iPhoneuser

customer_reviews.title: Quality bed at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for our daughter so she can have an extra bed when she has a friend stay over but be able to close the bed up to allow her to have more room in her small bedroom. The bed is very good quality and very sturdy. We were suprised by the height of it with her pillow top mattress. It sits up pretty high which she really likes. All of her friends love it, too. She uses it as a couch when friends are over. Only took my husband about 1 1/2-2 hours to put it together. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Useful and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Really nice bed for the price for my 8-year-old. Drawers are very useful, sometimes a little sticky but overall I'm very happy with this bed and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: NWP

customer_reviews.title: OK, but bad paint job
customer_reviews.text: The bed is about the quality I would expect for this price range, but the paint job is very poor. On one of the false drawers, the paint is so thin you can see the natural color of the wood beneath it.
customer_reviews.author: OCDShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bed, great quality, easy to assemble! I received it within 10 days! My almost 3 year old couldn't be happier, as am I!
customer_reviews.author: SPR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, came in three separate boxes, packaged well, good sturdy material. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: tsires

customer_reviews.title: Drawers
customer_reviews.text: Most of this bed is great. However, two of the drawers would not fit into the proper place. We had to buy a special tool to realign the mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K. Didawick

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to assemble and are very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these beds. They are easy to assemble and are very sturdy. The first one was purchased a few years ago and has really held up well. The bed is perfect for my teens!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and her friends really enjoy the bed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends really enjoy the bed. The quality is excellent. The only negative thing had to do with delivery. It took twice the estimated time and the packaging was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Sebastien L.

customer_reviews.title: Have drill handy
customer_reviews.text: I love the beds ... I got 2 of them for my daughters and they are thrilled. The first bed was a snap to put together and everything was perfect. It seems the second one missed the quality control inspection. Some of the holes were not even drilled out all the way and missing the holes for some of the pegs. I knew this because I had just put one together. Nothing to hard to fix ,but keep a drill handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevan Ritner

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and very good looking for 8 year old's new bed. There is a little gap between the trundle mattress and the upper bed and I don't prefer that but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Mrskafay

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, space saver twin with trundle bed. Works great for my son’s small bedroom. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aixa  Olivo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Trundle
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed... Pleased with quality. Son and brother put together with no problems. Sturdy, a bit high but love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Better than we thought it would be. Nice, functional, and was easy to assemble. Came packaged solid to withstand abuse.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: We've had various issues with this bed, from the ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had various issues with this bed, from the drawers not pushing in and out smoothly, to having to make holes for the nails by ourselves during construction.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a guest room
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to a guest room. It arrives in 3 boxes. Follow directions in order given. Well made with wood, not press board. Hardware (screws, etc.) is all there. Very pleased with the assembled results.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed, it is attractive and sturdy. Clean lines, heavy duty and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, haven't got it put together yet
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, not damaged. Looks great, haven't got it put together yet, due to a time issue on our part. But I feel confident that it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Ward

customer_reviews.title: This bed looks great in our twins' bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This bed looks great in our twins' bedroom. It is perfect for people who are trying to maximize space. It fits a twin size mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery went very well, assembly was not difficult, the bed has a few very small scratches or dings. It's not a big deal and not noticeable unless you're examining it in detail. The bed is very tall, therefore the trundle is also taller than usual which is nice. The drawers are a good size. Apart from the random imperfections I'm very happy with the bed.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great froe the price
customer_reviews.text: It went together nicely. Look beautiful and the trundel rolls on our carpet with no issues... My daughter loves her new bed.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Trundelicious
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product sleeps 2 in a small space, and still has 3 drawers for linen storage. Assembly was routine, and the finished furniture. just what I need. Bought the "often purchased" mattresses which complete the ensemble nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace bunkbeds in our daughters' room. It is will constructed and went together with ease! It was very well packaged. I think it took us longer to get all of the packaging off than it did to build the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Price

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured,
customer_reviews.text: The drawers wasn't as pictured, seller refund around 20 dollars for that. It didn't have the right screws plus screws not labeled right. It seamed to me like it was one that should have been labeled seconds. I bought one from Grand and it was perfect so I know the way it should have been. Thank goodness I knew how to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mahaffey

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. We like the cherry finish. Easy to assemble (about 90 minutes for me). Seems to roll in and out smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cox

customer_reviews.title: You won't be able to fit anything comfortable in
customer_reviews.text: The guide for the drawers won't stay in place. The trundle provides only enough space for a thin mattress. You won't be able to fit anything comfortable in there
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Blanks

customer_reviews.title: This bed is ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think that this is a great bed. It arrived on time and delivery was very easy. Assembly was pretty straight forward, but at least 2 people would be recommended (we had 3). Some of the pieces did look "faded", but since it's for a 5 year I wasn't too concerned. The slats let toys fall through to the bottom of the bed though, which is very frustrating - we added some cardboard to stop that. Also, one of the casters fell off after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to check the bed dimensions. This bed is very tall. The trundle is awkward. On the good side, the wood is nice, and the product was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Just delivered and unpacked - looks fine
customer_reviews.text: Just a "heads up" that even though there may be no shipping charge (with Amazon Prime) there could be a Delivery Charge. Got our call, this morning, and arranged delivery time. Driver alerted us that there would be a $129.21 delivery charge. Now, we live in a VERY rural part of Texas, and this had to come down from Abilene (about 100 miles West of us). Not that I thought it was inappropriate, I just wasn't expecting this charge.... Perhaps I missed something in the text for this product. When we get the bed assembled, I'll add an update.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, attractive piece of furniture. It was, however, a pain to assemble. That said, I feel like I got a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: G.S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bed!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this bed. It exceeded our expectations and my daughter loves it. It is very well made and the trundle bed is comfortable - just what we wanted and more!
customer_reviews.author: Maria B Hancock

customer_reviews.title: It was relatively easy to assemble and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to assemble and is very sturdy. It is exactly what I was looking for. The color was as pictured. It is easy to push the bottom bed back under the top and the drawers are very handy for extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: imladybuc47

customer_reviews.title: Love the bed, but mine had a split in one of the sides
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bed! Its a little tall but she has been getting on and off just fine. The assembly was easy my husband and I put it together in less than a hour. The only problem I had was one of the sides had a split in the wood at the foot and the stop for the trundle. Didn't notice it till we put the trundle together so at that point we had to glue and tape it. Other than that it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Janeczko

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We think this trundle bed is a great deal for the price and the white finish matches our child's room perfectly. The packing was bizarre, but it arrived in good condition. It was fairly easy to assemble. Only one drawer front had issues (drilled holes were too deep) Thankfully, my husband is quite handy, so it was fixed quickly. Overall I would definitely recommend it. Especially with the free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: N. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed in February 2013 for my daughter whom is now 8. It has lasted us this long without any problems. The Bed looks really nice and is very sturdy, the only thing is the drawers tend to get off track every now and then but no biggy. I assembled the bed by myself without any problems and to this day nothing has broke and the paint has not chipped. Great bed!
customer_reviews.author: Miss fisher

customer_reviews.title: Love it, got everything I expected including the drawers
customer_reviews.text: Love it, got everything I expected including the drawers, they're much bigger than I thought. And I also like how the trundle comes out all the way, I thought it would be attached to the bed like some I've seen in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina V.

customer_reviews.title: Coaster Trundle
customer_reviews.text: Best deal. Quick delivery. Easy to assemble. Looks great. Great function. Covers limited on trundle and mattress size an issue to be considered. But We love it!
customer_reviews.author: bobbi mccabe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a descent bed. Very happy with it thus far. Has a great look to it
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bonelii

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised how sturdy this bed is made. Nice paint job and was easy to assemble. I assembles this all by myself, only asked my husband to hold up one side. So you can managed to put this thing together with minor help from someone else. I left the boxes in the garage. And assembled in the bedroom only bringing in the pieces I needed. The drawers in the bottom is an extra plus! It is a tall bed. Long drop to the floor. When my granddaughter sleeps in it, I pull out the bottom bed also, so if she rolls off she will hit the bottom bed.
customer_reviews.author: DianeF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just like in the photo and its quality made
customer_reviews.author: Retract a review

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty high up so we leave the bottom pulled out ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves her new bed. It's pretty high up so we leave the bottom pulled out so she can climb up and in case she rolls out! I bought an 8 in for the top and a 6 in for the bottom which fit perfectly. I decided to switch and put the 6 in on top just because of how high it was, so the 8 in fits pretty tight on the bottom. I added a pic of what the trundle space looks like. The bed is open in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was really easy to assemble too
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it so much! It was really easy to assemble too.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.F.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed and very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from @AtHomeMart. Product is advertised and the pieces were very easy to assemble. The only downside is that 3 screws were missing which I had to go and buy from HomeDepot which was not a bad thing. One thing to note though for future buyers, the bed is quite high after putting the twin-bed, so a toddler sleeping on it may have some trouble to go in. In addition, you will need to get a railing so that your child won't fall of from the bed, but overall this product is nicely finished and very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: t7c192

customer_reviews.title: Company Does Right
customer_reviews.text: The product received was as described and solid. You do have to put it together. I received this product and the front panel of the pull out was damaged. I notified the company which promptly asked whether I preferred financial restitution or a new piece. I received the new piece promptly - this company did the right thing for it's customer.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa J Cohen

customer_reviews.title: very good for price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble in less than an hour. Good quality all wood construction. Looks great in person. True to product description. Trundle cannot accommodate thick mattress but we ordered 6 in mattress for it and 8 in for top. Bed is a bit high for younger child. Only have had it for couple of weeks but not worried about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Leanie

product_meta.title: La Salle Twin Captain's Daybed with Trundle and Storage Drawers Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackStrikingly sophisticated, this solid wood day bed makes a stylish statement in a guest room. Its bold, black finish gives it a thoroughly distinguished appearance. Complete with a trundle bed underneath, it provides a soft, relaxing sleeping accommodations for up to two guests without taking up too much space. It's also ideal for adding extra cozy seating to a living room. With a strong, sturdy frame, you and your loved ones will enjoy hours of comfortable support.
feature_bullets: Bed slats: 13 on top and 13 on bottom roll slats batten

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars278 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
